bug.author: icaro56
bug.description:
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Installation-Windows.md>https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Installation-Windows.md</denchmark-link>
You recommend Tensorflow version 1.4.0. "Latest versions of Tensorflow won't work, so you will need to make sure that you install version 1.4.0" And in the code tag is: pip install tensorflow==1.7.1

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/icaro56>@icaro56</denchmark-link> Thanks for that note, we will fix that along with the hotfix merge.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
